name: Digital Ecommerce Script
short_description:
Digital Ecommerce Script is the wonderful tool for anyone who wants to sell their digital goods online through a protected platform. This amazing tool gives you the capability to sell eBooks, Templates, PDF, icons, mp3, music, videos, photos and any other digital product of yours.

Admin features of our script:

Through admin you can able to view total sales, year sales, total orders, Number of customers, Customers awaiting approval, Reviews awaiting approval, number affiliates, affiliates awaiting approval etc. You can add/ delete different categories. Our script is very user friendly where you can set up product description, images, price tag and quantity. 

 As well as our script is open cart system so you can find the user detail, order detail, order invoice payment detail, payment method and one of the greatest advantage is that our script supports multiple payment gateways.

Make a Call: 9841300660
summary: Digital Ecommerce Script is the wonderful tool for anyone
